headline: Will Skyworks Solutions (SWKS) Wi-Fi 7 Expansion Strengthen Its Competitive Position in Connectivity?
summary: Earlier this week, Skyworks Solutions announced the expansion of its Wi-Fi 7 product portfolio, introducing new front-end modules and bulk acoustic wave filters that target enhanced range, speed, power efficiency, and compatibility across the 2.4 GHz, 5 GHz, and 6 GHz frequency bands. This broadened product lineup allows Skyworks to support increased wireless performance and flexibility at a time when advanced connectivity solutions are in growing demand. We'll explore how Skyworks'...
